T03bsa033_u:1113: yena śākyamunitathāgatādirūpeṇa āsaṃsāraṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ samīhitamarthaṃ samaṃ karoti, asau kāyaḥ prabandhatayā anuparato nairmāṇiko buddhasya bhagavataḥ sarvabālajanasādhāraṇaścaturtho 'vasātavyaḥ /
T03bsa033_u:1114: (kha) bhedaḥ nirmāṇakāyasya trayo bhedā bhavanti, yathā - uttamanirmāṇakāyaḥ,
T03bsa033_u:1116: buddhakāritrāṇi imāni bhagavato vicitrāṇi kāritrāṇi abhisamayālaṅkāre saptabhiḥ kārikābhirvistaraśo nirdiṣṭāni /
T03bsa033_u:1117: (ka) lakṣaṇam svasantatisthasarvākārajñatādhipatyenodayamāsāditāḥ śuklā guṇā eva buddhakāritrāṇīti lakṣaṇam /
T03bsa033_u:1118: (kha) bhedaḥ gatipraśamanakāritrata ārabhya nirvāṇaniveśanaparyantaṃ saptaviṃśatiḥ karmāṇyevāsya saptaviṃśatiḥ prabhedā bhavanti /
T03bsa033_u:1121: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karmaṃ saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe //
T03bsa033_u:1135: (gha) vaiśiṣṭyam vineyajanakarmānusāraṃ bhagavataḥ kāyavāṅmanaḥkāritrāṇi ākāśavad atyudārāṇi, nadīdhārāvad avicchinnāni, samudrataraṅgavat
T03bsa033_u:1137: (ṅa) avadhiḥ vineyajanapratibhāsabhāk saptaviṃśatiprakāraṃ karma avicchinnatayā āsaṃsāraṃ pravartate /
T03bsa033_u:1140: aṣṭapadārthopalakṣakāṇāṃ ca saptateḥ padārthānāṃ prakāśakamidaṃ subhāṣitaṃ jagadguroḥ maitreyanāthasya mukhānniḥ-sṛtasyāgamasya caturdikṣuḥ prasārāya lokasya ca sanmārgārohaṇāya prabhavediti pariṇāmanā /
T03bsa033_u:1144: jananīnibandhanakṛtād bījānmayāptācchubhāt sarvākāravarā bhavantu niyataṃ kāyatrayaprāpiṇaḥ
